title: Walmart is known for its ethical conduct, says retail analyst Mary Epner
text:
Walmart is known for its ethical conduct, says retail analyst Mary Epner 5:39pm GMT - 03:25 
Walmart will not settle cases and take this to the end, says Mary Epner, CEO of Mary Epner Retail Analysis, about former Walmart executive Tri Huynh's allegations that the company cheated on e-commerce. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
